website_summaries.verdict: Basic ingredients and meals made from scratch helped this author lose over 125 pounds.
pros: Perfect for loving your Instant Pot or pressure cooker even more than you already do
Most of the ingredients in this diet are simple, inexpensive, and readily available at most grocery stores
Focuses on making health eating convenient and fast
cons: A basic guide on healthy eating, and cutting out junk

customer_reviews.title: Simple recipes, easy to follow and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this cookbook: So many things! 1) Large print and the recipes are easy to follow. 2) Tips to transition to healthy eating. 3) Simple healthy ingredients. 4) The meals are quick and easy to make. 5) There is a 30 day meal plan. 6) I’m no longer afraid to use my Instant Pot! She explains things so well in the recipes. Finally, Brittany’s story of wanting to change, feel healthier and lose weight in a sustainable way really works!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Davini

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' the food plans!
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Brittany's blog for awhile now and have made many of her recipes, which have been great! When I heard she had a cookbook coming out, I had to buy it. I just received it today. Wow! It is so well thought out and organized, beautiful pictures, and I absolutely LOVE the food plan section! She lists 30 days of food plans, so you are able to choose which recipe you'd like to use for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Knowing her recipes, along with reading through the cookbook, they are all simple to put together. Once you have staples in your house, which she lists, cooking these healthy meals are a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: EMACK

customer_reviews.title: Easssssy recipes and super HEALTHY! Win WIN! 😘👍✌️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Guys I'am so excited to try all these yummy recipes!!! Lots of good ole home cooked meals PLUS tons of new HEALTHY options to try!! And a meal plan to help you on your journey to wellness! 🙌❤️💜 Brittany congrats girl! Luv Luv Luv it! Bless you girl and keep up all the hard work! Its paying off! 👍✌️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Book!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to FINALLY have this book in my hands. The book itself is so beautiful and the recipes are simple and easy to follow! Can't wait to cook my way through this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous book!
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the wait. I started eating clean and using Brittany's plans in 2018 and am so excited the book has new recipes along and many from her meal plans. This is not a "diet" but a "way of eating". My family loves that i actually cook now. Brttany is an inspiration and a real motivator. Give this book and Instant Loss a try. You won't be disappointed. I can't wait to make these recipes
customer_reviews.author: Steven V Ilardi

customer_reviews.title: More than a cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just down loaded this long awaited book. I couldn’t stop reading it. Although I have not made any of the recipes yet, they all look yummy with simple ingredients. This book is so much more than a cookbook, it’s a story, it’s food plans and to top it off it has recipes. If you follow her blog you will love this book. Just the introduction about Brittany’s story had me in tears. I am looking forward to following her recipes and food plans.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and quick recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my copy today, and I already know I'll be making many of these simple and quick recipes in the coming weeks and months. Brittany's story in the intro is authentic, raw, and heartfelt. I've been following her on social media for some time, and sometimes you just know when someone is just being her true self....and Brittany is doing just that. I love what she's done, and how she's simplified nutrition based on her experiences. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Reta Mourad

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Brittany's recipes for a little over a year , I have a problem eating certain foods ( dairy , bread, sugars, ect) could go on , my list of what I can eat would be easier lol, anyway since I have been following these recipes I feel SO much better , I SO love that she came out with a cookbook with many more recipes, easy to follow and little preparation to cook .
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my initial review was removed! Nothing against the author but these recipes, most of them are just ok. She lost lots of weight because she restricted her diet extensively and cut out lots of food. For people without her condition or her child’s condition this is not a realistic way to eat nor is it necessary to lose weight. On top of it the recipes are not pleasing to look at (the few pictures she has) and flavor wise they are lacking. I found myself having to make many adjustments to make palatable. This is also not a strictly instant pot book....
customer_reviews.author: Mexiguat

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I've followed the Instantloss Facebook group for quite awhile but have been hesitant to try out many recipes because they rely so much on nuts and my kids are allergic to several types of nuts. I finally caved and bought the cookbook though after seeing so many wonderful reviews of the recipes and finding some substitutions for nuts in several of the recipes. I'm so glad I did. Several of the recipes are already staples in my meal rotations for the family and I have a bunch more that are marked to try down the road. The recipes are easy to follow and I feel better serving home cooked meals rather than take out or overly processed foods.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie's World of Books

customer_reviews.title: So much more than a cookbook!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this cookbook! I discovered Brittany a few weeks ago and used the meal plans from her website and lost 20 pounds! All of her recipes are so flavorful and delicious! In fact, my husband loves them which is an added bonus! As soon as I got home I opened my book. I have never cried reading an introduction of a cookbook. Wow! I felt so connected to Brittany. This is one of the best cookbooks ever and it will be used every single day in my kitchen and in my life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...you won’t be sorry!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the only cookbook I need! Within the last year I have lost 110 lbs and have used so many of the instant loss recipes to make this change possible! Bonus...my husband and kids love all of the dishes too! Try them all you won’t be sorry. Finding my Amazon package on the porch felt like Christmas! Thanks Brittany! You have a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Some great recipes for healthier eating
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this cookbook and it has many easy and healthy recipes. I rate it a 4 star only because the preface contains some dubious health claims that are anecdotal at best and not backed by science. If it had been presented as "this works for me but is not backed with science", I could have overlooked that. I am a facts based kind of gal. Also, this is not exclusively an Instant Pot cook book, so if you are expecting only IP recipes, you might be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have these recipes on paper!
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Brittany for about a year now. She's the reason I asked for an Instant Pot for Christmas last year. Now, it's the only constant thing (besides the fruit bowl) on my counter. As much as I have loved her website recipes (and I have LOVED them), I'm so excited to have new recipes together, on real paper! There is nothing better than thumbing through a book and finding what sounds good, making notes about what I like, would add, etc. I've already seen a handful of recipes I'll be making this week. Happy, healthy eating everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy ( at least) two because you will want to give one to someone you love!
customer_reviews.text: Reading this book made me want to buy more to just give to friends and family. Brittany tells her story and demonstrates knowledge regarding a healthy way to eat. Even though I follow her online and have many "Pinned" recipes, this book makes it so easy to find recipes,you will refer to often. The ingredients are fairly simple, plus have wiggle room to alter, if you like. I appreciate the many "snack" recipes for when you do want to indulge your sweet tooth, but still be somewhat healthy. I was hoping the book would be great but it is SO great--I felt a surprising amount of joy reading it!
customer_reviews.author: S. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Easy HEALTHY recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book and love her IG page. Made the lemon basil salmon and the fresh Mediterranean bowl. AMAZING. People. You need to buy this book and just eat real food. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Recipes of love made from a heart of gold!
customer_reviews.text: *******Updated: The only thing I wish it had were the page number next to each recipe on the 30 day meal plan. Other than that, I'm so excited for this! Brittany has inspired me daily for a long time, and I always wished I could have the success she has. Today, it is like she sent me all her tips and tricks right to my doorstep! Every recipe is full of integrity, perfection, and a lot of love! I am so excited for this and especially for the 30 day meal plan. Thank you instantloss! <3
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Buy this cookbook!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this book could even be given one star by anyone! I have been waiting for this book for what seems like forever, it was delivered today and it has not left my side since I got it! It is a beautiful book and I am so thankful to Brittany for coming out with this cookbook! I have tried many of her recipes from her website and they are all delicious! I made the chocolate chip cookies tonight from this cookbook and OMG, So good!!! GET THIS COOKBOOK!!
customer_reviews.author: Donny S

customer_reviews.title: Love this Book
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love , Love this book and also Britanny ..I have never met her personaly but she has helped me alot with losing weight and eating healthy the last year and a half .i love her recipes and my family loves them .I am excited to try the new recipes in the book ..People eating JERF is the best way to lose weight .just eat real food .I recommend everyone who wants to lose weight and who has to be on a gluten free diet to BUY this book .It makes it so easy to lose weight and keep it off .
customer_reviews.author: E.W

customer_reviews.title: Get this cookbook, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this cookbook. It was a good read, then she tells you how to achieve making this a lifestyle and then to top it off we get the recipes to all her goodies. Absolutely love Brittany and all she stands for. Thank you for being a guide to us all. Best of wishes!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Instant Loss book
customer_reviews.text: I have made several meals from this cookbook. We have liked all of them. Most of the ingredients are easily found at the local supermarket, those I haven't found are likely more related to the market moving things around than the products themselves. These recipes are much healthier than some of the other Instant Pot recipes I have found and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: I need the nutritional info
customer_reviews.text: I get that it is not her way but it is my way. If I had known this I would have never pre purchased. I have not made any recipes but I use a lot of cookbooks all with the nutritional info.
customer_reviews.author: MoniMoni

customer_reviews.title: My go-to cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book doesn't even go on my cookbook shelf, it stays on the counter because I'm always making something from it. Some of the items I keep making, on my regular rotation are: chewy cinnamon-apple breakfast bars (I freeze in portions then grab when I run out to work in the morning), loaded breakfast sweet potatoes (actually have for a work lunch), zuppa toscana, chicken tortilla soup, simple chicken causer salad, asian chicken lettuce wraps, light and fresh mediterranean bowl, classic tostadas, skinny enchiladas (made this one a lot), 10- minute turkey burgers. I still have a lot to try, but those have been my favorites so far! I've already pre-ordered her next book b/c I love it!
customer_reviews.author: nattynew

customer_reviews.title: Inspirational, Real, Delicious
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing!! I have never in my life wanted to buy a cookbook let alone read it front to back. This book is all that I expected and so much more!! Brittany's story, recipes and meal plans are exceptional and I pray that she continues to grace us with her knowledge, and amazing recipes (family approved)! If you want healthy alternatives that taste simply delicious, do yourself a favor and buy this book!! A++
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Eating clean, healthy, and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love InstantLoss Cookbook because Brittany Williams uses clean healthy food and demonstrates how to cook it in a flash! For once, I don't have to revise ingredients because she limits dairy and grains already. This book has helped me embrace my Instant Pot, which was the purpose of buying it. Her recipes are creative, delicious, and inspire me to take it a step further by experimenting with my own creations. Thank you for sharing your journey and experience with me!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Pam Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Not a Long-Term Solution
customer_reviews.text: All the hype and what I found was recipes which use ingredients that would not sustain me for a long time. Returned the book - maybe it will be helpful for another amazon customer - me....not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Not an Instant Pot cookbook
customer_reviews.text: most of the recipes do not use an Instant Pot. the books title is a misnomer.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love love love. Yum yum yum.
customer_reviews.text: I have Brittany’s meal plans from her website and love those. This book has a full month meal plan. So exciting. Her recipes are so easy to follow. No hard to find ingredients. I appreciate her including her story. If you follow her IG or website you know that she doesn’t push her lifestyle or choices on anyone she simply shares what works for her and is so upbeat and positive. Motivating too. So happy to now have her cookbook since I now have two Instant Pots in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Caterpillar26

customer_reviews.title: Unrealistic
customer_reviews.text: Outfitting my tiny kitchen with expensive tools is not gonna happen. And most of these recipes are things that I wouldn't make. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Max

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of “Instant Pot” recipes. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the author and was excited when her book came out, so I ordered right away. Sadly I’m pretty disappointed because I thought this book would have more “Instant Pot” recipes, or meals. There’s a lot of smoothies, and breakfast muffins. The meals are pretty basic too, like how to make chicken tortilla soup, or hard boiled eggs. I wish I could return it. I don’t see myself using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle - honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed, well written, wonderful recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been following Brittany online for almost a year now. Her candid outlook and humility once again shine through within the pages of the intro. I knew I would like many of the recipes because I previously purchased meal plans. My spouse and I lost over 20lbs each while following her plans. Who knew the versatility of black beans? Who would’ve guessed how great real food could taste? Breakfast frittata, blender muffins, hummus, and so many more great recipes....I can’t wait to continue creating healthy habits. Thank you Brittany!
customer_reviews.author: JESSE R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with Brittany and her story on Instagram @instantloss. She’s real and so is her cookbook. It’s a cookbook that speaks my language. With so many “ways to eat healthy” these days I was frozen in my tracks. Honestly, I’m not even a book lover in general and I stopped immediately to read this entire cookbook including Brittany’s story the moment it arrived. The thought and recipes placed in this book are freeing! Get yourself a copy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Etzel

customer_reviews.title: This positivity changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about this book! I reccomend it to everyone I know. The recipes are delicious and easy! Best of all, this book has completely changed my outlook on food, health, and nutrition. Every healthy eating plans talks about it being a lifestyle change and a mind set change but none of them tell you HOW to change that mindset. By following Brittany's recipes and paying attention to my body and how it responded to different things that switch finally flipped for me. My relationship with food is forever changed - for the better - because of this wonderful book!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Hall

customer_reviews.title: She must have been on heavy medication when she wrote this book.
customer_reviews.text: Major errors and omissions such as writing a recipe for Italian Gnocchi soup and forgetting to put Gnocchis in the ingredients list.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldPhart

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I started following Britney on Instagram about 12 months ago. In the first 4 months of using her recipes and sticking to the mantra 'just eat real food' I lost 50lb. I'm now pregnant and while not losing weight I've managed to maintain my weight through the first 6 months and feel terrific. All recipes aren't for the instant pot and there are some great salads, smoothies etc too but if you're looking for a way to start eating better and look after yourself I could recommend this more. I recommend Instant Loss to all my friends and family looking for healthier alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Nothing unique or original.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Very disappointed. Recipes are not that appetizing and appealing. Waste of money for me. Save your money and just go on the net and search for recipes like these and you can get it for free!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chesnut

customer_reviews.title: An OK intro to healthy pressure cooker meals
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely some good, simple, and easy to follow recipes in here for your pressure cooker. For that reason, I think it’s a good addition to my cookbook collection. Although her story in the intro is obviously very personal and inspirational, there are some questionable medical terms that made me pause. As a very novice pressure cooker owner, I think think is an OK intro cookbook but I wouldn’t recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: llmar

customer_reviews.title: Real food FULL of flavor! Great for busy moms and dads!
customer_reviews.text: This book is just what I needed! My current obsession is pictured, oatmeal that tastes like apple pie! I've read handful of reviews here and I understand not everyone is ready, or even needs to, change their diet, but if you need a fool proof way to start to eat healthier and want food that actually has flavor, try this book! The beef and broccoli recipe: Amazing!! The vegan Mac and cheese (better than real cheese for me), and the poblano Chili...sooooo good. Brittany has mastered the simple but flavorful recipe. I purchased 3 others as gifts! If it's time to make a change, you'll appreciate this book
customer_reviews.author: Nugsma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this book. The last healthy cookbook I bought had all these meals & ingredients that I have never heard of & didn't know where to even buy. I have already made a handful of recipes & I am LOVING it so far! I can buy everything locally which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Hackl

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a must have if you want to throw all the processed foods out of your lifestyle. This is a beautiful book with many colorful pictures. Very simple to follow!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: My autoimmune disease is in remission.
customer_reviews.text: I started using Brittany’s recipes a year ago and honestly had no weight to lose but wanted to change the way my body functions as I have Systemic Lupus. She made it easy to cook, learn and execute as even the shopping list has been made for you. She truly is a blessing to me and my family and i can thank her for the quality of life i now have. Oh and did i mention this cool book is AMAZING. Be sure to check out her blog InstantLoss.com for free recipes, tips & tricks and transparent updates on how eating this way has changed her life and others!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyFriscoTX

customer_reviews.title: Easy, adaptable real food recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Highly adaptable recipes with real ingredients! Adjust each recipe to your liking and this book is truly perfect! All recipes can be dairy free but if you eat dairy, use dairy options! Too spicy for you? Use less red pepper and chilli powder (their family likes a LOT of spice apparently so I use 1/4 or even less of the spicy ingredients, sometimes cut them out!) Can't find an ingredient at the store? Just use a simular alternative. Easy to follow, tasty recipies that the whole family will love!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Most used cookbook in the house
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook. It was interesting to read about Brittany's story and how she came about creating these recipes. I do not follow the ingredients rigorously since my husband and I do not have the same food sensitivities as her family, so I substitute some of the ingredients if I don't have what she uses on hand (e.g. flour or cornstarch for arrowroot starch) but everything I have made from her recipes has been delicious. It's also very helpful to be a part of her Facebook page to see what others are loving from the book and her website. I can't say that we are losing weight from these recipes but we are eating healthier more often.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: So many great recipes! My family has like everything I have made from this book. It's the only way I cook now. Also I didn't buy and more gadgets of appliances in order to make these recipes. All you really need is an Instant Pot and blender. So good and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Bought another as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: My first copy of this book was a gift. This one I bought as a gift for a friend, yup it's that good! We have been sampling recipes from it for several months. The recipes are flavorful and nutritious oh and most are ready in 30 mins. But more importantly cooking in the instant pot was like learning to cook all over again. Brittnay gives perfect directions that make the instant pot less daunting and simple enough even a non cook could follow and still make a delicious health meal. She's real, relatable, and the intro honestly brought me to tears. You won't be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Family

customer_reviews.title: Even my husband enjoys these recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful recipes for the instant pot! Even some for the oven. Lots of good advice and suggestions too. Although I've tried over the year to eat "clean" this is the first time that it has actually been EASY. AND my husband enjoys the recipes too (a big deal because he has NEVER liked anything I've made that was grain and/or sugar free). The main dishes are loaded with flavor. I just cannot say enough. And several of my friends use the book too. We are constantly sharing what we make and enjoy (which is everything) :) Give it a go! You will love it if you want to enjoy the JERF method of eating.
customer_reviews.author: cherry3m

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook.....Great story!
customer_reviews.text: This is not only a cookbook but a great way to clean up your way of eating. Healthy nutritious meals that are delicious & really easy to make. I’ve had to add a few things to my pantry that I didn’t have but knowing they are better choices made that easy. I especially liked reading the beginning of the book which is an amazing story of the health journey Brittany & her family have been on. I would recommend this book to anyone who has an instant pot whether or not you are interested in weight loss. It’s good CLEAN recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Yummy, and Healthy Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I was not looking for a diet cookbook, but one that contained healthy recipes, especially for my Instant Pot. This cookbook delivered! Some reviews have been critical that not all of the recipes are for a pressure cooker, but who uses that appliance for three meals a day? This cookbook has given me some nice new (and healthy) ideas for breakfast and lunch, when I don't use my IP. The section on "kitchen aids and pantry" is filled with recommendation of what you need in your kitchen for healthy cooking. I have especially loved the "quick and easy one pot meals". I am using this cookbook weekly, and am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not Instant Pot recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw her story on The Today Show and I was really looking forward to a lot of healthy Instant Pot recipes. I was disappointed when I started looking at the recipes. Most are not Instant Pot recipes and many of the ingredients are weird, expensive ingredients that can only be purchased o line and at specialty stores. What a waste of money. Now it just sits and collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: Marika

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookbook and the author!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook and Brittany! She is real and transparent, follow her on Instagram! As a registered nurse I know her issues and her diet change and lifestyle change made the difference! Read her story in the book. She is a inspiration. Her recipes arent "fancy" or complicated just real food! To get more out of the book you should follow her blog and Instagram, she shares so much more there too!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook has simple ingredients and easy to follow recipes. There are a lot of basic staples, as well as some healthy classic meals that the whole family will want to eat. Brittany is truly inspiring and I enjoyed reading her story and meal plan. Eating clean and healthy has never looked so delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Simple, tasty, healthy recipes. Total score!
customer_reviews.text: I've made the following: grain-free banana bread, skinny chicken pot pie, and classic (gluten-free) meatloaf from her book and have made "cheesy" sausage chowder from her blog. My family and I have enjoyed each and every one of these meals. I've got a list of recipes that I can't wait to make [my TBM list for the book lovers out there ;-) ]. The fact that most if not all are dairy-free, gluten-free and basically clean warms my heart. That they are delicious warms our bellies. :-)
customer_reviews.author: S Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: NOT for the average cook.
customer_reviews.text: The recipes need crazy ingredients that you wouldn’t have on hand or can’t buy if you live in a small town. There are only a handful of instant pot recipes. This book is not for someone who just wants healthy EASY instant pot recipes. I had a hard time finding one recipe I would make.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie22

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I checked this out of the library on a whim and was so into it that I knew I had to have it for my kitchen. Every recipe I've tried has been a huge hit. None of them have come off as "healthy food", just delicious and satisfying. If you found this review HELPFUL, please click the button below. THX!
customer_reviews.author: 1PickyWoman😋

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy to Follow
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this cookbook as both my husband and I need to take better care of ourselves. He has just started his journey of healthy eating and I’m maintaining my loss. First day we had the book we made two recipes, spicy tomato basil soup and grain free garlic biscuits. Both will be keepers for sure and we will do some minor tweaking to our tastes. We both went through the book and have a lot of recipes we’d like to try. Plus the bonus here is since it uses the instantpot cooking is a lot easier to do. Very pleased with our purchase so far and the variety of recipes in the book as well.
customer_reviews.author: Risikay

customer_reviews.title: Be Skeptical When Cooking
customer_reviews.text: The thing I like best about this book is the information about cooking staples (contained in the back of the book) and the overall information about using an Instant Pot. The recipes themselves should be used carefully, and (in my opinion) need adjustments. The cooking time is way off. I've found that most often I have to double the times because I've had too many things turn out half cooked. And the recipes are very basic and bland -- I personally like more spices. This is a good guide, but don't take everything too literally. I've had to adjust all the recipes I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, healthy eating lifestyle cookbook
customer_reviews.text: How many cookbooks have you read that made you teary eyed? The forward the author writes is amazing because it shows you how and why she did what she did. I’ve tried many of her recipes from her website and I can’t wait to try these new ones! I love that all the recipes are simple and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Love some of the recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to LOVE this cookbook. I certainly have some favorite recipes in here for sure but a lot of the recipes have items that a lot of people may not have laying around and can be pricey (almond flour, coconut flower, arrowroot powder) I think once I can slowly afford these items and have them I’ll be able to try more recipes and will enjoy it even more. It’s worth buying for sure, but be prepared to have a large expensive shopping list at first. I don’t have enough flexibility in my budget to add that much in one trip so slowing collecting things!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Easy Cooking!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is fantastic it is so easy simple quick ingredients directions very easily laid out. I personally love the ingredients are in order as the steps go for the recipe makes following along really quick plus I cooked it 9 days in a row 3 meals a day. (I meal prep) and every single meal turned out delicious. Adults and our kids are eating it up!
customer_reviews.author: CWings

customer_reviews.title: I am inspired on so many levels from this wonderful book
customer_reviews.text: Brittany Williams book is remarkable. Not just the inspired collection of creative recipes, but the spirit and honesty and wisdom as she shares her story with us. We love her, because we are all in this together with her. I have never read a cookbook cover to cover on the day I bought it...until now. Beautiful lady inside and out. Brittany is shining her Light, indeed. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: So excited for this book!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following Brittainy for over a year now and I’m so excited to have all of these recipes in a beautiful book! I cannot wait to start cooking even more wholesome and easy meals for my family. We do not have dietary restrictions, we just love eating real food!
customer_reviews.author: DragonflyReads

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: This us more about her weight loss story than a cookbook. Very few recipes for the instant pot. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: K. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Real life weight loss challenge.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome information. Real life story on weight loss struggles. Real and unique recipes. Would give 10 stars out of 5 if I could!
customer_reviews.author: SOlsen

customer_reviews.title: Simple recipes and an easy read!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this book. While I am a experienced cook (home and professional), sometimes I just want easy, delicious meals with simple recipes and steps. I made some healthier lifestyle changes and see a difference but frankly meal prep and long ingredient lists are sometimes exhausting after a 14 hour work day. I appreciate her recipes and honesty!
customer_reviews.author: melissah

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Meal Plan
customer_reviews.text: The book is nice with beautiful pics, but it is not predominantly Instant Pot, and only a few IP recipes i'd try. The meal plan and grocery list are way beyond confusing, some recipes serve 4 to 6, some only 2, and trying to make adjustments to avoid waste became overwhelming and costly for 2 people following the meal plan. There are a few recipes i'll try, hope they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Rob m

customer_reviews.title: Practical advice and tips
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way this cookbook is laid out. I feel like she’s bringing a lot of real life experience to the table. I’ve tried many of the recipes on her bloh and they’re all great. It looks like there are a lot of new recipes here.
customer_reviews.author: Words with friends

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of recipes in this cookbook! I try to cook with alternative ingredients that are better for me and I love that I have most of the ingredients she uses. I also love being able to have recipes for more than just the instant pot! There isn’t a lot of complicated steps which also makes me happy because after work I’m tired and want to make things that are simple but delicious and good for me. Plus she is super fun to follow on Instagram! Thank you for a great cookbook, can’t wait for the next one!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Post

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, informative and as she puts it, also your girlfriend!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of Brittany’s recipes from her online blog. All have been so tasty. She puts some simple stayed true recipes in it and simple homemade recipes for condiments, which is very helpful. I am completely in agreement with her thoughts on ingredients and foods, while eating. Everyone has different views on what is right and wrong but Brittany is very informative on what has worked in her experience! Thank you so much for sharing your story and most of all your kitchen with all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Eggebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of recipes, but ones that use coconut oil. I started using coconut oil a few years back and doubled my cholesterol in 3 months time. I have yet to bring those numbers back in alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Imat

customer_reviews.title: Cook your way to better health!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO excited to jump into wellness with this cookbook! I’ve recently been unmotivated and unimpressed with just about everything. Brittany’s book was a kick in the butt and a reminder that I’m not alone in this journey. I can’t wait to cook my way through this entire cookbook! Only complaint (if you can call it that) is I wish there was more photography I could drool over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More then I could have hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I feel like Christmas came early. I have religiously bought all of Brittany’s meal plans and was so thrilled to find out she was writing a cookbook... it exceeded all of my expectations!! The info in the beginning is well written, informative and at times, completely touched my heart with it’s honesty. The pictures are beautiful, the recipes are simple yet enticing. I am so thankful to have found instantloss a year ago and because of Brittany I have been able to change my eating habits toa better and healthier lifestyle! The weight loss is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McGuiness

customer_reviews.title: Healthier versions of comfort food
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this book as an e-book, paperback and a paperback as a gift. For 21 years I was a professional chef. I find this cookbook a valuable resource as I don’t have to overthink what I am doing in my insta pot. Is it traditional fare? - no. It is healthier versions of comfort food. If that sounds good to you, I think you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from the recipes
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent book with interesting personal anecdotes from the author. I just expected a little more from the recipes. Many are repeated from the instant pot cookbook. Was hoping for new main dishes. Also not really sure how steaming a bag of frozen veggies constitutes a recipe. I’m hopeful the recipes will be tasty. I’ll keep it because I originally was sent the Kindle version by mistake and found the color of the lettering hard to read while working in the kitchen. I requested the hard copy instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae Zurawski

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have made the Skinny Chicken Pot Pie, Cinnamon Apple Oatmeal, and the Blueberry Breakfast Cake - YUMMM!! I have had my Instant Pot for a long time, but haven't really used it for more than boiled eggs, potatoes, and yogurt. This book has some great, easy recipes for the Instant Pot, and mine is definitely getting used more now!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Must buy cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I finally received my book from UPS around 4 and sat down and started reading it cover to cover and just finished! During that time I also whipped up some taco soup p.90 and it was AMAZING and so easy!!!! The book is beyond my expectations that I had in my head. I can’t wait to make some of these recipes. They are not only going to get us healthier they are going to simplify my life! Brittany did such an amazing job on this book, it has so many pictures and words of wisdom and amazing recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 80% Instant Pot Recipes 20% More delicious recipes.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this is the first cookbook I have every really stuck with and read and used! I found the beginning of her story and explanation of ingredients so helpful. I love my Instant Pot so I am drawn more to the recipes for that, but I’ve slowly started using the other ones as well. It’s so nice to have ideas for all meals and she even comes up with more on her blog that she shares! I’ve recommended this to several friends especially those with milk allergies. I cannot wait for her next book on december.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Seems basic
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for a healthy cookbook to utilize my instant pot. When I first browsed the cookbook after I got it I noticed egg salad, “simple” chicken soup, black beans, and fried eggs among other things that are easier to make after a simple GOOGLE search rather than a cookbook. I also didn’t like that there weren’t more pictures. All in all, it seems way too boring for me but could be helpful to someone who has no idea how to cook basic recipes. I’m returning it with the hopes of finding a more exciting and healthy instantpot cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Hanaoka

customer_reviews.title: The recipes taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This book changed my life!! The recipes are amazing and easy. Even my kids and husband cook from it. I lost 27pounds in my first month just by sticking to the recipes! Everything tastes amazing. I had almost given up on my instant pot because everything tasted so bland. I love how easy and fast it is to make a meal. And I never have to wonder what is in my food. If you want to get your butt in gear and get healthy this book will not disapoint! My husband calls it our bible lol
customer_reviews.author: Tresha

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: I have followed Brittany's health journey for awhile and was ECSTATIC when she released her own cookbook! All of her recipes provide a healthy take on food we all love. I've purchased one for myself and gifted one to my parents for Christmas! This woman is inspiring and I encourage everyone to get on board!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla P.

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy cookbook
customer_reviews.text: My family eats healthy and I wanted a healthy cookbook that would be a good introduction to the instant pot I received for Christmas. We have enjoyed every single recipe and I’ve made more than half the book now. Our favorites are the brownies, enchiladas, coconut pancakes, and chicken pot pie.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: What a refreshing take on whole foods! The recipes are wholesome, delicious, quick and easy. I love Brittany‘s style and her ‘note’ on each recipe. The recipes taste good and use ingredients I normally have on hand. I’ll be using these recipes often! It’s wonderful to find recipes that don’t use processed ingredients. Good job!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Montemayor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and delicious
customer_reviews.text: So far we have enjoyed all the recipes we've tried, and they are all easy to follow. My personal favorites have been the lemon chia seed muffins, cleaner corn chowder, and spicy tomato basil soup.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best Cookbook Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cookbook. I purchased after receiving my InstantPot and reading about the author's incredible weight loss and overall health improvement. After receiving the book, I've been consistently making the recipes for my family. I have lost approximately 20 pounds but more importantly, I see an amazing difference in my energy level. I would highly recommend this cookbook for anyone interested in InstantPot cooking and living a more healthy lifestyle. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Stick with it!
customer_reviews.text: This book has helped me get moving again. I have lost weight and gained energy. I am mobile again. My kids enjoy the food too. They were not to happy about it at first but they have loved every one of the recipes. This book is not only a way to loose weight but a way to begin a new lifestyle. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Erika MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: This has opened my eyes to better alternatives to our everyday ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cookbook. I share it with everyone I can. She has helped me look at ingredients and learn to choose healthier alternatives when I can. The recipes are great. It is a well rounded mix of instant pot and simple recipes. This cookbook has opened my families tastebuds to other foods that we would not have tried otherwise. I love that I can use homemade OR store bought and the recipes still come out.
customer_reviews.author: bill coonan

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and Instant Pot instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I made a few of these recipes to see if I liked this book. Not only are the recipes truly yummy, the instructions are step-by-step for using your instant pot! I like this recipe book so much that I'm buying several more as gifts for Christmas. Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Art Lover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Love that everything is gluten free
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lady! Go follow her on Instagram! Book is full of recipes for your insta pot and some recipes that don’t need the instant pot. If you are allergic/intolerant to wheat then this book is perfect for you! It’s not a “keto” cookbook as some believe. It just happens to be a lower carb cookbook because she doesn’t use gluten. Also a lot of dairy free recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Nut allergy alert!
customer_reviews.text: I have not made anything yet because we are an allergy household and the majority of these recipes have at least one major allergen. If you have a nut allergy, look elsewhere. This is not the book for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Got Brittany's Book today!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, well laid-out and easy to read. The recipes look great. They use fresh, real food - no mixes or processed foods. Most of the ingredients I have or I usually buy at the grocery store anyway. I know I can use this diet and work it into a healthier life-style.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Perry

customer_reviews.title: It's more than a cookbook and more than an Instant pot cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I love this "first" cookbook from Brittany Williams!! (First because she will need to write more 😊) It is a story of why she made the changes for her family and herself as well as an amazing cookbook full of meal plans, whole food recipes and lots of love!
customer_reviews.author: Superstar!!!101

customer_reviews.title: Easy and excellent recipes!
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in here are excellent, not only because they taste good but because they provide pretty quick ways to make wholesome meals. Many of the recipes are dairy and gluten free which helped me expand on how to use certain ingredients. I never thought I'd be making an alfredo sauce with cashews (and zero cheese), but I did and it was incredible! I highly recommend this book and encourage anyone who buys it to join the Facebook group where you can ask questions, get help tweaking recipes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Zwerlein

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stop thinking about the Chicken Poblano soup!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this book so much, I bought a second one versus carrying the one I had bought Back and forth from our cabin! Love so many of the recipes. You’ll never find a cookbook where every recipe is one you like - but the majority of these are fabulous. I’m particularly fond (as in, could eat it every day) the Chicken Poblano soup! I carefully double it every time I make it - because it’s even better the 2nd or 3rd day! So yourself a favor and buy this book! You’ll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Love this book!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have followed the instant loss blog for months and absolutely love her recipes! I could not wait to get my hands on this book and she did not disappoint! I would give this 10 stars if I could! Delicious, easy, and healthy. I look forward to many more books in the future.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wray

customer_reviews.title: Nothing I’d make
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I didn’t find one recipe in here that was either helpful or something I’d make. Several pages of silly basic “recipes.”
customer_reviews.author: AshandMolls

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cooking with an instant pot!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever review to leave on Amazon and I have been with amazon for years! I discovered Brittney on Instagram the end of last year. My hubby bought me an instant pot in Black Friday and I had no clue how to use it. After coming across Brittney’s Instagram and meal plan, I fell in love with my instant pot. I’m so excited to finally have her cookbook and I look forward to making more of her recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Millera

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookbook! You will only regret not purchasing it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait for this new book! 💕LOVED her first cookbook 🙌 it’s the first cookbook I have cooked my way through. Some family favorites: Egg roll in a bowl, blender muffins, chocolate peanut butter oatmeal, apple cinnamon oatmeal, tortilla soup.
customer_reviews.author: TCasto

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy meals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cookbook. We’ve had plenty of recipes from it and have loved each one! Our favorite is the enchiladas! My husband asks for it weekly! Our son has food allergies so some recipes we haven’t tried but we’ve found ways to make it suitable for us as a family to enjoy. He’s dairy, wheat, soy and egg free. Thank you Brittany Williams! I can’t wait to order your next book when it comes out!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cookbook!! I’ve learned how to prep, freeze, cook and eat healthier by following Brittany’s JERF way of life. This has truly helped me learn how I can eat healthy, feel better, lose weight and keep the weight off without dieting or using any other weight-loss plans that never worked for me. THIS is the ONLY way I fix and prepare meals by cooking her recipes. Love, love, love!! BUY THIS BOOK!! You will be happy you did. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL INSTANT POT
customer_reviews.text: I think this book is a little false advertising (not about losing weight, but about the type of recipes). I was specificaaly looking for healthy instant pot recipes... but a lot of the recipes in this book are non-instant pot, or require the stovetop/oven in addition to the instant pot. If thats what you are looking for this is perfect, but i was disappointed cause I thought all the recipes would only require instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes
customer_reviews.text: I use this recipe book quite a bit. I love how simple the recipes in this book are. It’s great be able to be able to use “alternative” ingredients without feeling intimidated. Everything I’ve made has been good and my family has enjoyed it too. Knocked off one star for the dubious-sounding science in the beginning of the book that didn’t have any sources referenced. It didn’t bother me enough to turn me off from the book, but I do think it’s important to use references for things that aren’t considered common knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: MB

product_meta.title: Instant Loss Cookbook: Cook Your Way to a Healthy Weight with 125 Recipes for Your Instant Pot, Pressure Cooker, and More
